A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Put me in the camp of Haters of this movie.  It is a LONG convoluted piece of crap.  There are so many questions it doesn't answer and we probably won't ever find out.  I'm a huge star wars fan and was thoroughly disappointed in this movie.  Carrie Fisher was terrible in her last performance.  It sounded like she had marbles in her mouth when talking.  The love story between Rose and Finn was so forced and silly.  There are a couple of nice scenes.  I did like R2-D2 and Luke meeting up and I really liked the Hyperdrive Kamikaze.  Like everyone else\, I really was looking forward to this movie.  It just didn't deliver the goods.
